text:
@davidfrum @EchoOfIndia No corona was there in Cat family, Pangolins, bats for long. They have different genome. They can infect each other may be but transmission from animal to human or again human to animal is not. 
Human Covid-19 has changed which can transmit from human to human but not animal

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
